user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the usecase

epics.title: Project Initiation and Requirement Gathering
epics.summary: Set up project groundwork and capture business requirements
epics.description: Define the vision, objectives, and scope of the project by engaging stakeholders and users. Document functional and non-functional requirements, identify success metrics, and establish technical and design baselines necessary to begin development.

epics.title: User Registration and Authentication
epics.summary: Enable secure user access to the platform
epics.description: Develop user onboarding processes including registration, login, and logout functionalities. Implement secure authentication standards, encryption mechanisms, and session management to protect user information and ensure reliability.

epics.title: Core Use Case Implementation
epics.summary: Develop key functionalities central to the use case
epics.description: Build the main features that support the intended business process. Establish database models, backend logic, and business workflows that align with project objectives to ensure the platformâ€™s main functionality operates seamlessly.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience Design
epics.summary: Design and develop user-friendly and responsive interfaces
epics.description: Create an intuitive and visually appealing interface for end users. Implement responsive design to ensure compatibility across devices and browsers while emphasizing accessibility and efficient user interaction.

epics.title: Integrations and Feature Expansion
epics.summary: Integrate the platform with third-party services and expand feature set
epics.description: Add integrations with external APIs, services, or systems such as payment gateways, report generators, or analytics tools. Introduce advanced functionalities that enhance platform value and user convenience.

epics.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
epics.summary: Validate system quality and performance through structured testing
epics.description: Perform end-to-end testing to ensure that all modules function as expected. Conduct usability, performance, and security testing, addressing all defects found to guarantee a stable, secure, and optimized release.

epics.title: Deployment and Production Rollout
epics.summary: Deploy the system to production environments
epics.description: Establish deployment pipelines, configure production infrastructure, and conduct pre-release checks. Execute deployment ensuring zero downtime, proper version control, and complete documentation for continuity.

epics.title: Monitoring, Feedback, and Continuous Improvement
epics.summary: Monitor live systems and implement user-driven improvements
epics.description: Set up monitoring tools to track performance, errors, and user behavior. Collect and analyze user feedback to guide iterative improvements, ensuring the platform continues to evolve in alignment with business goals.

user_stories.title: Identify and engage stakeholders
user_stories.description: As a project manager, I want to identify and engage stakeholders, so that I can define the project's vision, objectives, and scope.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include all relevant stakeholders such as users, sponsors, and domain experts.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a list of potential stakeholders, when they are engaged, then the stakeholders should be confirmed.

user_stories.title: Document functional requirements
user_stories.description: As a business analyst, I want to document functional requirements, so that they can be clearly communicated to the development team.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure requirements are specific, measurable, and traceable.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the business needs, when functional requirements are documented, then they should be reviewed and approved by stakeholders.

user_stories.title: Identify success metrics
user_stories.description: As a project manager, I want to identify success metrics, so that the project's progress and success can be effectively measured.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Metrics should be aligned with project objectives.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the project objectives, when success metrics are identified, then they should be documented and tracked.

user_stories.title: Develop user registration functionality
user_stories.description: As an end user, I want to register on the platform, so that I can create an account for accessing its features.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Allow users to register with a unique username and a valid email address.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can successfully register with a unique username and valid email.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new user, when they complete the registration form, then they should receive a confirmation email.

user_stories.title: Implement login functionality
user_stories.description: As a registered user, I want to log in, so that I can securely access my account and platform features.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure that user credentials are securely authenticated.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can successfully log in with valid credentials.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a registered user, when they enter their credentials, then they should be logged in and redirected to their dashboard.

user_stories.title: Implement logout functionality
user_stories.description: As a logged-in user, I want to log out, so that I can securely end my session.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure that all session data is cleared upon logout.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can successfully log out, ending their session.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in user, when they log out, then their session data should be cleared.

user_stories.title: Establish database models
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to establish database models, so that we can store and manage data effectively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure data integrity and relationships between models.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the data requirements, when database models are created, then they should be validated for integrity and relationships.

user_stories.title: Develop backend logic
user_stories.description: As a backend developer, I want to develop backend logic, so that it aligns with the business workflows.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure code is modular and follows best practices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the business workflows, when backend logic is developed, then it should be unit tested for functionality.

user_stories.title: Design intuitive user interface
user_stories.description: As a UI designer, I want to design an intuitive user interface, so that users can navigate the platform easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure the design is user-centric and visually appealing.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User interface designs approved and usability tested.
user_stories.test_cases: Given design requirements, when the UI is designed, then it should pass usability testing with end users.

user_stories.title: Implement responsive design
user_stories.description: As a front-end developer, I want to implement responsive design, so that the platform is accessible on various devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure compatibility across different devices and browsers.
user_stories.test_cases: Given multiple device types, when the responsive design is implemented, then it should render correctly on all devices.
